Russia shouldn’t meddle in our elections. There’s no excuse - which i said on TV this morning, though many in the media failed to note that part. U.S. shouldn’t do it either. I am opposed to Judge Kavanaugh’s nomination to the Supreme Court. His record shows he would be a threat to the Affordable Care Act. We can’t let his nomination sail through without a fight. Call your Senators today at (202) 224-3121.
